name: Starbaby
description:
After a sudden alien attack aboard the Starship Festivus, it's up to baby Violet to defeat the invaders and rescue her parents.

(Note that this is a demo version which will be updated between now and the April 3rd Jam submission deadline)

Created for the Driftwood Gaming 'Build Your Own Game' Jam

Featured Themes:

  -Babies

  -Survival

Controls:

  -ENTER or Left-click to attack, interact with objects. 

  -ESC, Right-click, or Numpad-0 to access the Menu

  -Movement with arrow keys or mouseclicks.
